name: UStaticMesh

LODGroup: The LOD group to which this mesh belongs.
NaniteSettings: Settings related to building Nanite data.
DistanceFieldSelfShadowBias: Useful for reducing self shadowing from distance field methods when using world position offset to animate the mesh's vertices.
LODForCollision:
Specifies which mesh LOD to use for complex (per-poly) collision.
Sometimes it can be desirable to use a lower poly representation for collision to reduce memory usage, improve performance and behaviour.
Collision representation does not change based on distance to camera.
AssetImportData: Importing data and options used for this mesh
bCustomizedCollision: If the user has modified collision in any way or has custom collision imported. Used for determining if to auto generate collision on import
AssetUserData: Array of user data stored with the asset
bGenerateMeshDistanceField:
Whether to generate a distance field for this mesh, which can be used by DistanceField Indirect Shadows.
This is ignored if the project's 'Generate Mesh Distance Fields' setting is enabled.
bHasNavigationData:
If true, mesh will have NavCollision property with additional data for navmesh generation and usage.
          Set to false for distant meshes (always outside navigation bounds) to save memory on collision data.
bSupportUniformlyDistributedSampling:
Mesh supports uniformly distributed sampling in constant time.
Memory cost is 8 bytes per triangle.
Example usage is uniform spawning of particles.
bSupportPhysicalMaterialMasks:
If true, complex collision data will store UVs and face remap table for use when performing
PhysicalMaterialMask lookups in cooked builds. Note the increased memory cost for this
functionality.
bSupportRayTracing: If true, a ray tracing acceleration structure will be built for this mesh and it may be used in ray tracing effects
bAllowCPUAccess:
If true, will keep geometry data CPU-accessible in cooked builds, rather than uploading to GPU memory and releasing it from CPU memory.
This is required if you wish to access StaticMesh geometry data on the CPU at runtime in cooked builds (e.g. to convert StaticMesh to ProceduralMeshComponent)
bSupportGpuUniformlyDistributedSampling:
If true, a GPU buffer containing required data for uniform mesh surface sampling will be created at load time.
It is created from the cpu data so bSupportUniformlyDistributedSampling is also required to be true.

methods.name: AddMaterial
methods.doc: Adds a new material and return its slot name

methods.name: AddSocket
methods.doc: Add a socket object in this StaticMesh.

methods.name: BuildFromStaticMeshDescriptions
methods.doc: Builds static mesh LODs from the array of StaticMeshDescriptions passed in

methods.name: FindSocket
methods.doc:
Find a socket object in this StaticMesh by name.
Entering NAME_None will return NULL. If there are multiple sockets with the same name, will return the first one.

methods.name: GetBoundingBox
methods.doc: Returns the bounding box, in local space including bounds extension(s), of the StaticMesh asset

methods.name: GetBounds
methods.doc:
Returns the number of bounds of the mesh.

@return      The bounding box represented as box origin with extents and also a sphere that encapsulates that box

methods.name: GetMaterial
methods.doc:
Gets a Material given a Material Index and an LOD number

@return Requested material

methods.name: GetMaterialIndex
methods.doc:
Gets a Material index given a slot name

@return Requested material

methods.name: GetNumLods
methods.doc: Returns the number of LODs used by the mesh.

methods.name: GetNumSections
methods.doc: Returns number of Sections that this StaticMesh has, in the supplied LOD (LOD 0 is the highest)

methods.name: GetNumTriangles
methods.doc: Returns the number of triangles in the render data for the specified LOD.

methods.name: GetSocketsByTag
methods.doc: Returns a list of sockets with the provided tag.

methods.name: GetStaticMeshDescription
methods.doc: Return a new StaticMeshDescription referencing the MeshDescription of the given LOD

methods.name: RemoveSocket
methods.doc: Remove a socket object in this StaticMesh by providing it's pointer. Use FindSocket() if needed.

methods.name: SetMaterial
methods.doc: Sets a Material given a Material Index

methods.name: SetMinLODForQualityLevels
methods.doc: Allow to override min lod quality levels on a staticMesh and it Default value (-1 value for Default dont override its value).
